com.mps.pearl.util

Interface Constant


  • public interface Constant
    This interface represents all the constants used in the system. The constant properties of the Application can be configured from this class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CLIENT_PING_EVERY_SECONDS
      Other Nodes ( Clients Node ) ping frequency
      static int MAX_INACTIVE_NODE_CACHE_SIZE
      Max set of Node while can be Inactive as a Cache Size
      static int SERVER_ABORT_EVERY_SECONDS
      Coordinator ( Server Node ) abort time
      static int SERVER_BACKLOG
      Coordinator Backlog as a requested maximum length of the queue of incoming connections
